mapper.update:
update COURSETEMPLATE
COURSENAME = #{coursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CIRCLE_ID = #{circleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ORIGINALPRICE = #{originalprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CASHBACK = #{cashback,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
COMMISSION = #{commission,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SERVICECHARGE = #{servicecharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COURSEHOURNUM = #{coursehournum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COURSEHOURLENGTH = #{coursehourlength,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CLASSSIZE = #{classsize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POPULARITY = #{popularity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STARTDATE = #{startdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FINISHDATE = #{finishdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CUTOFFDATE = #{cutoffdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NOREFUNDDATE = #{norefunddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CASHBACKDATE = #{cashbackdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BOOKINGTYPE = #{bookingtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STARTUPONARRIVAL = #{startuponarrival,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STARTTIME1 = #{starttime1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FINISHITIME1 = #{finishitime1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STARTTIME2 = #{starttime2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FINISHITIME2 = #{finishitime2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REGLOCATION = #{reglocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFERENCE = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COURSEINTRO = #{courseintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUIZ = #{quiz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFICATION = #{certification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPENCOURSEREQUIREMENT = #{opencourserequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUITABLESTUDENT = #{suitablestudent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREREQUEST = #{prerequest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HIGHSCOREREWARD = #{highscorereward,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDYDAYNOTE = #{studydaynote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEACHINGMATERIALINTRO = #{teachingmaterialintro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTIONBANK = #{questionbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALITYASSURANCE = #{qualityassurance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSAGREEMENT = #{passagreement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTRACURRICULAR = #{extracurricular,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGPHONE = #{regphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OUTLINE = #{outline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOAL = #{goal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLASSTEACHER = #{classteacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEACHINGANDEXERCISE = #{teachingandexercise,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTIONSESSION = #{questionsession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAIL = #{trail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGNMENTS = #{assignments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKING = #{marking,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BONUSSERVICE = #{bonusservice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOWNLOADMATERIALS = #{downloadmaterials,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEACHINGMATERIALFEE = #{teachingmaterialfee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEACHINGMETHOD = #{teachingmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
